name: Double sided, stand alone block, 3 pack, small
description: 15mm wide stand alone photo blocks. These have acid free adhesive on both sides and are great to stand on desks, mantle pieces, book shelves etc. Pack of 3 Blocks are 9cm x 9cm Put the kids art work on the blocks for cheap, easy and unique gifts. Like all our products they are excellent quality and easy to use. Simply peel off the adhesive backing paper, stick on your photos or craft work then trim to size. Our photo blocks are not just painted like cheaper products, they have a hard wearing edging applied. Easy to clean and always look good. All prices are listed in Australia dollars. To find the current exchange rate go to XE.com

name: Magnetic block, 3 pack, small
description: All prices are listed in Australia dollars. To find the current exchange rate go to XE.com Pack of 3 Magnetic blocks. Acid free adhesive on the front for photos, artwork, scrap booking etc. A great way to show off kids art works or as a gift for the grandparents. Each magnetic photo block is 5cm x 5cm

name: Collage Kit 1
description: 3 photo blocks with backboard and mounting hook. Finished size 16cm x 30cm Kit comes with the photo blocks, backing board and a hook and can be mounted vertically or horizontally. The photo blocks have an acid free adhesive on them and are very easy to use. You can put photos on all the blocks or design as you wish using scrap booking papers and embellishments, ribbons, interesting backing papers etc. Once you have made up the photo blocks you simply glue them onto the backboard. Photo blocks are 15mm thick and finished with a long life edging, the backboard is 3mm giving a wonderful 3D effect. Your photos will stand out and create a beautiful eye catching story board. Full instructions are supplied. 2 year warranty. Photo block mounts make a fantastic gift. All prices are listed in Australia dollars. To find the current exchange rate go to XE.com
